General.Name: Great China Metal Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Great China Metal Ind. Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies food and beverage packaging containers in Taiwan and internationally. It offers aluminum cans for carbonated drinks, beers, juices, coffee, tea, and sport drinks; tin cans for fruit juice, coffee, tea, dairy products, sport drinks, porridge, snacks, and other products; food jar for squash, gluten, meat, fish, nutritional food, pet food products; can lid and bottom; and stretch films, such as machine stretch, handmade, paperless tube, colored, and slitting small films, which are applied for packing transportation in the fields of beverage drinks, chemical raw materials, paper printing, chemical fiber products, electric products, auto parts, decorative plates, canning containers, and warehouse logistics. The company provides OEM and ODM containers, such as milk powder, meat floss, biscuit, nuts, candy, tea, jam, motor oil, cream, and gift box cans. In addition, it offers metal cans, including coated aluminum, three-piece iron, re-extruded, DRD, and art cans; iron and beverage lids; and plastic wrapping films. Further, the company provides printing and packaging services for various metal; investment services; and manufactures and sells metal containers, other plastic products, and packaging machine, as well as aluminum pop can and lid. It serves customers in food, beverage, electronics, packaging, and other industries. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
